Text: I wanted to call my band Snap Crackle and Pop. Hey I just heard the bad news that Lux Interior passed away this morning. Ive been in the scene since I was thirteen, since 86, but I never listened to them. Ringo Starr said he liked them once on TV. Well, I read an article and got on here to get some stuff, and I saw you have this, their first show on video. So thank you very much, I have a lot of experience in Rehab and Psycho care facilities myself. And have a special interest in how others are cared for. Peace and Love.

Friends !! please load up Cramps videos.
Threre are not so much out there...

I been a Cramps fan ever since "psychedelic jungle" wich is a brilliant album !!!

Lux is now in rock-heaven with the others...
Thanks! Looking forward to watch this. :)
